title: Grace's Scavenger Hunt (Person of Interest)(2 x 8)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: Who knew... our awkward, smart and recluse billionaire was actually a hopeless romantic.
Beautiful, just beautiful. And the violin is just perfect.
One of the best shows and profound scenes I've seen in recent times <3
This is so sweet.. the look in their eyes..
description:
Harold sends Grace on a birthday scavenger hunt which eventually takes her to the Guggenheim.
